trans-unit.source: Provides a page adapter for the XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 XHTML 介面卡集合中的頁面配置器。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The XhtmlPageAdapter class inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: XhtmlPageAdapter 類別繼承的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter>類別並實作<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of any additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied.
trans-unit.target: 取得的任何其他的 HTTP 標頭，藉以變更快取的清單。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> class inherits the CacheVaryByHeaders property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> interface and always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>類別繼承從 CacheVaryByHeaders 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter>介面，一律會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> object of additional HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList>其他 HTTP 標頭的物件。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current cookieless <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session*> property data, if any.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 cookie<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session*>屬性資料，如果有的話。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The CookielessDataDictionary property is populated when a valid <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface is configured as an attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlsSection> element.
trans-unit.target: CookielessDataDictionary 屬性會填入時有效<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>介面設定的屬性為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlsSection>項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlsSection> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing key/value pairs for the current cookieless <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*> data, if any; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含目前 cookie 的索引鍵/值組<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*>資料，如果有則否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer that is appropriate for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回適用於目標裝置的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object or an object inherited from the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>物件或物件繼承自<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter"></xref> object based on the provided <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter"></xref>物件依據提供<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>物件。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Returns the postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Because some devices handle postback differently from others, the DeterminePostBackMode method allows the adapter to modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: 某些裝置處理回傳的方式不同，因為 DeterminePostBackMode 方法可讓配接器來修改集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object that contains request information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref>物件，其中包含要求資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的引數識別項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: 來自要求物件的回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> object containing all query string or form parameters and values.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref>物件包含所有查詢字串或表單的參數和值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 指出裝置介面卡集合是否套用至指定的要求。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>目前要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType*> for the browser is one of these members of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref> object: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType*>瀏覽器是其中一個這些成員<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref>物件︰ <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key for submitting the event argument.
trans-unit.target: 取得提交事件引數的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: If an inheriting adapter overrides the EventArgumentKey property, it must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A> method to process the postback.
trans-unit.target: 如果繼承的介面卡會覆寫 EventArgumentKey 屬性，它也必須覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A>方法以處理回傳。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key.
trans-unit.target: 表示索引鍵的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key for submitting the event source.
trans-unit.target: 取得提交事件來源的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: If an inheriting adapter overrides the EventSourceKey property, it must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A> method to process the postback.
trans-unit.target: 如果繼承的介面卡會覆寫 EventSourceKey 屬性，它也必須覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A>方法以處理回傳。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key.
trans-unit.target: 表示索引鍵的字串。

trans-unit.source: Called if an unhandled error occurs on the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的錯誤，就會發生在頁面上，呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: An adapter can choose to handle the error and display an error message.
trans-unit.target: 配接器可以處理錯誤，並顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> class does nothing and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>類別不做任何動作，並傳回`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>物件。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the adapter handles the postback event.
trans-unit.target: 指出配接器是否處理回傳事件。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The HandlePagePostBackEvent method is called during postback.
trans-unit.target: HandlePagePostBackEvent 方法呼叫回傳期間。

trans-unit.source: An adapter can choose to handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 配接器可以處理此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> class does not handle the postback event and always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>類別不會處理回傳事件，且一律會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref>物件的目標裝置。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The InitWriterState method is called before rendering the page.
trans-unit.target: InitWriterState 方法被呼叫轉譯頁面。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the following properties on `writer` for the target device: - <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A>
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定下列屬性上`writer`目標裝置:- <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets conditional pagination for the page.
trans-unit.target: 設定條件式分頁的頁面。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.ActiveForm%2A> property for the page.
trans-unit.target: OnPreRender 方法會檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.ActiveForm%2A>屬性頁面。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.ActiveForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.Action%2A> property is not empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A> property for the active form is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.Action%2A>屬性不是空的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A>作用中表單的屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.OnPreRender%2A> method before exiting.
trans-unit.target: OnPreRender 方法呼叫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>方法，然後再結束。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Form%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel?displayProperty=fullName> class, which provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Form%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel?displayProperty=fullName>類別，可提供<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Form%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> object for the OnPreRender method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>OnPreRender 方法的物件。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether items from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*> property are persisted in the query string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指出是否從項目<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*>屬性會保存在查詢字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*>

trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_CookielessDataDictionaryType" name="CookielessDataDictionaryType" href=""></xref> in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MobileControls" name="MobileControls" href=""></xref> configuration section of the Web.config file is set to a valid dictionary type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_CookielessDataDictionaryType" name="CookielessDataDictionaryType" href=""></xref>中<xref uid="langword_csharp_MobileControls" name="MobileControls" href=""> </xref> Web.config 檔案的組態區段會設為有效的字典類型; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sends the page content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref>, which renders the content to the client.
trans-unit.target: 將網頁內容傳送至提供<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>，其呈現給用戶端的內容。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object that writes the content to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>的內容寫入至用戶端瀏覽器的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a link on the current page to enable postback on devices that do not support postback events.
trans-unit.target: 若要在不支援回傳事件的裝置上啟用回傳目前頁面上建立的連結。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Some devices are able to execute a postback event on a link or button only.
trans-unit.target: 某些裝置都能連結或按鈕只能在執行回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The RenderUrlPostBackEvent method writes a link with a URL that contains all of the information that is required to process the form and to update and display the page.
trans-unit.target: RenderUrlPostBackEvent 方法將寫入的 url，其中包含所有的資訊，才能處理表單和更新，並顯示網頁的連結。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object that writes the link.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>物件寫入的連結。

trans-unit.source: The target URL for postback.
trans-unit.target: 回傳目標 URL。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event for which the link is substituting.
trans-unit.target: 事件以替代與連結的名稱。
